Simon Cowell is said to have finally persuaded US TV executives to give her a slot on the panel. '' Simon Cowell is the boss of this show,'' a source told the News of the World. He gets what he wants and he wants Cheryl Cole . The money you make on American TV is huge, but there's also a huge risk. ''The way American contracts are gives Fox the chance to opt out if viewers don't take to her. But Simon Cowell won't let that happen.
